entities.name: corridor
entities.description: The corridor is described as being quite different from the ones above, with bare walls and no windows or doors apart from a plain black one at the end.

entities.name: walls
entities.description: The walls are mentioned as being bare in the corridor.

entities.name: windows
entities.description: Windows are mentioned as not being present in the corridor.

entities.name: doors
entities.description: Doors are mentioned as not being present in the corridor apart from a plain black one at the end.

entities.name: Mr. Weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as seizing Harry by the arm and dragging him to the left, where there was an opening leading to a flight of steps.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being dragged by Mr. Weasley to the left, where there was an opening leading to a flight of steps.

entities.name: steps
entities.description: The steps are described as leading down to another corridor.

entities.name: lift
entities.description: The lift is mentioned as not coming down that far.

entities.name: Snape's dungeon
entities.description: Snape's dungeon at Hogwarts is mentioned as having a similar corridor to the one they are currently in.

entities.name: Hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as being associated with Snape's dungeon.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley dragged Harry to the left, where there was an opening leading to a flight of steps.
Mr. Weasley led them down the steps to another corridor.
The lift does not come down that far, implying it is above the current corridor.
